channel.title: Adding login text [Unsolved]
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Hi, i currently want to add a login to my server, so when an admin logs in it will yell to evreyone admin Name has logged in
Make it for the player, mod, admin, owner, and co[/size]
THANKS
--ICEPKERS[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 19, 2009, 10:11:31 am[/size][hr]Anyone

item.title: Adding login text [Unsolved]
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

[quote=“teh war of noobs, post:6, topic:320475”] if (playerRights == 0)
{
sendMessage(" Welcome to servername “);
sendMessage(” Message “);
sendMessage(” another message! “);
sendMessage(” message! “);
sendMessage(” message “);
sendMessage(” Server Owner: Name");
sendMessage(" Server Co-owner: Name “);
sendMessage(” More messages “);
sendMessage(” another message “);
sendMessage(” More and more messages “);
sendMessage(” [forums] forums link if u have ");
newWelc();

you have to just copy and paste under it and change the player rights (this is for 317 only!!!)[/quote]

He don’t mean this I think, also if he don’t have the newWelc void it wont work also.

On topic: what base are you using ?

Read full topic

{
sendMessage(" Welcome to servername “);
sendMessage(” Message “);

you have to just copy and paste under it and change the player rights (this is for 317 only!!!)

item.title: Adding login text [Unsolved]
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

In the run method:

if(playerRights == 0) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Player " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if(playerRights == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Moderator " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if(playerRights == 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Administrator " +playerName+ " has logged in"; }

Read full topic
